sentence.Network_en: In some ways, the official opening is a formality.
sentence.Network_cn: 从某些方面来说，正式的开幕仪式只不过是走个形式。

sentence.Network_en: Lillith's formality and seriousness amused him.
sentence.Network_cn: 利莉思的拘礼和严肃让他觉得好笑。

sentence.Network_en: It's a formality which we have to go through.
sentence.Network_cn: 它是我们必须办理的一项手续.

高一英语单词表 - 豆丁网 ... South Carolina 南卡罗来纳州（美国州名） formal adj 正式的；正规的 error n 错误；差错.
西方正式（formal）着装高度制度化（highly codified）并有固定定义（fixed definition），但非正式（casual）着装则变化迅速，女装 …
形式主义（formalism），指在艺术、文学、与哲学上，对形式而非内容的着重。有形式主义行为的人，被称为“形式主义者”。

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent. (in the sense 'accordance with legal rules or conventions'): from French formalité or medieval Latin formalitas, from formalis (see formal)

entry.def: If you say that an action or procedure is just a formality, you mean that it is done only because it is normally done, and that it will not have any real effect on the situation.

example.ex: With the Cold War almost over, the talks were a mere formality.
example.tran: 随着冷战即将结束，对话就只是一种形式了。

entry.def: Formalities are formal actions or procedures that are carried out as part of a particular activity or event.

example.ex: They are whisked through the immigration and customs formalities in a matter of minutes.
example.tran: 给他们办理入境和通关手续只用了短短几分钟时间。

means.word_mean: 1. a requirement of etiquette or custom
2. a manner that strictly observes all forms and ceremonies

auth_sentence.content: The slow formality of an oblivious and drowsy exchequer.
auth_sentence.res_content: The slow formality of an oblivious and drowsy exchequer.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The slow formality of an oblivious and drowsy exchequer.

auth_sentence.content: But many think that will be more of a formality.

auth_sentence.content: Formality is on the decline the world over.

means.word_mean: 拘泥形式, 拘谨;遵守礼节

sentences.en: There’s no time for formality in everyday life.
sentences.cn: 在日常生活中没有时间讲究礼节。

sentences.en: We’ll have to observe the formalities.
The manager’s signature was just a formality.
sentences.cn: 经理的签字只是一种形式。
